author: Samie Hartley
title: Saturday Napa Farmers Market canceled
text:
Top Story Breaking Saturday Napa Farmers Market canceled Samie Hartley Dec 12, 2024 Dec 12, 2024 Updated 6 hrs ago 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save The Napa Farmers Market announced it has canceled the Saturday, Dec. 14, market based on heavy rain and winds forecast during market hours.
“Cancelling a market is never a decision we take lightly; however, because of concerns about weather conditions, we’re making the tough call to protect safety,” said Mimi Adams, operations and market manager. “We encourage everyone to come downtown to shop and support our family farmers and small business vendors next Tuesday and Saturday.”
The Napa Farmers Market will be open Tuesday, Dec. 17, which is the last Tuesday market until April 1, 2025.
Listen now and subscribe: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | RSS Feed | SoundStack | All Of Our Podcasts
The Saturday market is open Dec. 21 but will be closed Dec. 28 for a holiday break.
Both Tuesday and Saturday markets are open 8 a.m. to noon in downtown Napa at 1100 West Street.
People are also reading… Man arrested on manslaughter, DUI allegations after fatal Napa County crash Chicken Guy! scheduled to open Thursday in American Canyon Two former Red Hen restaurant sites slated for Napa hotels Be Bubbly Napa to close downtown Napa space, refocus business Dogs reportedly abandoned near Calistoga, taken to Napa shelter Three suspects in fatal Napa shootings plead not guilty BottleRock tickets for Napa residents go on sale Wednesday At least one dead in I-80 crash near American Canyon Mayacamas Charter Middle School’s test scores from first year prompts disappointment and tension at meeting 25 rescued Chihuahuas to find new homes, but not in Napa County 'Putting all the fish in a barrel': Moving begins at Napa's Kennedy Park homeless encampment Napa City Council supports parking code changes to address car camping, oversized vehicles Northern California 5-A Football Championship: American Canyon earns state title shot with 43-20 rout of Lassen Three arrested after robbery at Napa's Ulta Beauty store Napa County looks at development near airports Starting in January, the market will be open every Saturday, rain or shine, unless extreme weather conditions are forecasted, according to the press release.
For more information visit napafarmersmarket.org and sign up for the market's email list to receive a weekly newsletter and breaking news alerts.
